column5: A value of "true" specifies a blind stitch after the last stitch.
Array containing the y-coordinate of the needle positions. The number of entries SHALL match the number specified in @NumberOfNeedles.
Specifies the number of needles to be used.
Specifies the distance between the stitch and the binding edge. Used only when @SewingPattern="Side".
Sewing pattern. Allowed values are: CombinedStaggered Normal Side – Side
